trial_identification.studytitle: A Phase-1 Study to Assess the Pharmacokinetics, Safety and Tolerability of AVP-786 in Healthy Volunteers
trial_identification.scientifictitle: A Phase 1, Single-center, Randomized, Open-label Study to Assess the Pharmacokinetics, Safety and Tolerability of AVP-786 (Deuterated [d6] Dextromethorphan Hydrobromide/Quinidine Sulfate) in Healthy Volunteers

interventions.interventions:
Treatment: drugs - AVP-786 Treatment: drugs - AVP-923
Experimental: Cohort A - Period 1 - Twice daily dosing orally for 7 days
Active Comparator: Cohort A - Period 2 - Twice daily dosing orally for 7 days
Experimental: Cohort A - Period 3 - Twice daily dosing orally for 7 days
Experimental: Cohort B - Period 1 - Twice daily dosing orally for 7 days
Active Comparator: Cohort B - Period 2 - Twice daily dosing orally for 7 days
Experimental: Cohort B - Period 3 - Twice daily dosing orally for 7 days
Treatment: drugs: AVP-786
Treatment: drugs: AVP-923

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Incidence of adverse events (AEs) for AVP-786

eligibility.inclusivecriteria:
- Healthy adult males
- 18 - 45 years of age
- BMI 18 - 30 kg/m2
eligibility.exclusivecriteria:
- History or presence of significant disease
- History of substance abuse and/or alcohol abuse with the past 3 years
- Use of tobacco-containing or nicotine-containing products within 6 months
- Use of any prescription or the over-the-counter medications within 14 days

ethicsAndSummary.summary: To assess the multiple-dose pharmacokinetics (PK), safety and tolerability of AVP-786 (deuterated [d6] dextromethorphan hydrobromide [DM]/quinidine sulfate [Q]) in healthy volunteers.
